abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the conglomerate run by Warren E. Buffett, returned to profitability in the second quarter, helped by gains in derivatives tied to world equity markets.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, the conglomerate run by Warren E. Buffett, returned to profitability in the second quarter, helped by gains in derivatives tied to world equity markets.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway returned to profitability in the second quarter on gains in derivatives tied to world equity markets, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Berkshire Posts Profit After a Rare Loss
